metadata.title: CVE-2024-5696 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: By manipulating the text in an `<input>` tag, an attacker could havecaused corrupt memory leading to a potentially exploitable crash. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 127 and Firefox ESR < 115.12.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
